quote: The way you speak to yourself matters
author: Bryant McGill

quote: Your calm mind is the ultimate weapon against your challenges. So relax
author: Bryant McGill

quote: When you want to succeed, as much as you want to breathe, then you'll be successful
author: Eric Thomas

quote: Believe you can, and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The mind is just like a muscle- the more you exercise it, the stronger it gets, and the more it can expand
author: Idowu Koyenikan

quote: To fall in love with yourself is the first secret to happiness
author: Robert Morely

quote: Mindfulness helps us to live in harmony with our thoughts, words, and actions
author: Amit Ray

quote: Sometimes the bad things that happen in our lives put us directly on the path to the best things that will ever happen to us.
author: Nicole Reed

quote: Just when you feel you have no time to relax, know this is the moment you most need to relax.
author: Matt Haig

quote: Mindul eating emphasizes a spirit of exploration, experimenting and flexibility in finding ways to make use of nutritional information
author: Jean L. Kristeller
